wikipedia_page.main: Charlie Raposo (born 15 January 1996) is a British alpine ski racer.He has been competing on the World Cup tour for three seasons, as well as the European Cup tour where he frequently competes for podium positions. He has competed at three World Ski Championships, his first being at the 2015 World Championships in Beaver Creek, USA, in the giant slalom.
